alert.note: Alert for Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:48AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central York, Rockingham, southeastern Strafford and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1048 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brentwood, or 7 miles west of Exeter, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Derry, Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Salem, Dover, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Raymond, York, Newington, Seabrook, Rye, Pelham, Stratham and Newmarket. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 17. Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
